mapper.select: select max(price) as price from paimai_goods_offers where goods_id=#{goods_id}
select * from paimai_goods_offers where goods_id=#{goods_id} order by price desc limit 1

select gof.*,g.title as goods_name,p.title as performanceName, (select max(price) from paimai_goods_offers mgof where mgof.goods_id=gof.goods_id) as goods_max_offer_price from paimai_goods_offers gof left join paimai_goods g on g.id=gof.goods_id left join paimai_performances p on p.id = gof.performance_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
